name: Tiny Hero (archatype)
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 38 Theme: A Small World

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/tiny-hero

Update: 0.2 removes the panel showing the number of waves the hero has defeated after a game over. Will put it back in at a later date when it is fixed. :)

Gameplay:

Enemies will spawn around the map in waves. Attack them to keep them off the castle in the middle. You will gain experience and gold from defeating enemies.

Use the experience to upgrade your hero and gold to upgrade Rinlin (Your home castle).

Controls:

You can click on enemies to attack them

Left mouse click for a normal attack

Right mouse click for bash attack. This attack will stun enemies and will prevent them from performing an action or moving.
